function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of specific measures to prevent virus propagation through entrances and surfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases spreading within the built environment","Mitigation":"Implement specialized entrance floor systems and antimicrobial surface coatings","Technologies":"Special floor systems, antimicrobial coatings","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Incomplete response to the impact of natural light on virus propagation","Impact":"Lack of consideration for the potential benefits of natural light in preventing virus propagation","Mitigation":"Include recommendations for natural light exposure and window size to mitigate virus propagation","Technologies":"Natural light optimization, window design","People":"Architects, building designers","Owner":"Project managers, architects"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of moisture management and humidity control for disease prevention","Impact":"Risk of mold growth and increased humidity levels contributing to disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement thorough moisture management and humidity control strategies based on expected standards","Technologies":"Moisture sealing, humidity control systems","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
